title: CMMB/MBI partnership for multiscale mathematical modelling in systems biology
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
findingsText: From 2009 to 2013 the BBSRC supported a partnership between the Centre for Mathematical Medicine and Biology (CMMB) at the University of Nottingham and the Mathematical Biosciences Institute (MBI, Ohio). This facilitated organisation of workshops, and particularly CMMB staff, postdocs and PhD students attending numerous events at the MBI. The partnership between the Centre for Mathematical Medicine and Biology (CMMB) at the University of Nottingham (UoN) and the Mathematical Biosciences Institute (MBI, Ohio) continues via joint funding from UoN and the MBI. This will continue to facilitate exchanges, participation in MBI programmes and postdoctoral mentoring in the field of mathematical biology. Agriculture, Food and Drink,Environment,Healthcare,Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology
